com.google.gcloud.datastore

Class DatastoreHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gcloud.datastore.DatastoreHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatastoreReader, DatastoreReaderWriter, DatastoreService, DatastoreWriter

    public class DatastoreHelper
extends Object
implements DatastoreService
    Adds some functionality to DatastoreService that should be provided statically to the interface (Java 8).

      • get

        public Entity get(Key key)

      • get

        public Iterator<Entity> get(Key... key)
        Description copied from interface: DatastoreReader
        Returns an Entity for each given Key that exists in the Datastore. The order of the result is unspecified. Results are loaded lazily therefore it is possible to get a DatastoreServiceException from the returned Iterator's hasNext or next methods.
        Specified by:
        get in interface DatastoreReader
        See Also:
        DatastoreReader.get(Key)

      • allocateId

        public Key allocateId(PartialKey key)
        Description copied from interface: DatastoreService
        Allocate a unique id for the given key. The returned key will have the same information (dataset, kind, namespace and ancestors) as the given key and will have a newly assigned id.
        Specified by:
        allocateId in interface DatastoreService

      • allocateId

        public List<Key> allocateId(PartialKey... key)
        Description copied from interface: DatastoreService
        Returns a list of keys using the allocated ids ordered by the input.
        Specified by:

        See Also:

      • add

        public Entity add(PartialEntity entity)
        Description copied from interface: DatastoreService
        Datastore add operation. This method will automatically allocate an id if necessary.
        Specified by:
        add in interface DatastoreService
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to add
        Returns:
        an Entity with the same properties and a key that is either newly allocated or the same one if was already complete

      • add

        public List<Entity> add(PartialEntity... entity)
        Description copied from interface: DatastoreService
        Datastore add operation. This method will automatically allocate id for any entity with incomplete key.
        Specified by:
        add in interface DatastoreService
        Returns:
        a list of Entity ordered by input with the same properties and a key that is either newly allocated or the same one if was already complete
        See Also:
        DatastoreService.add(PartialEntity)
